processing_structure.text: Receive the input integer from the user
Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: Re-read the task: you must read an integer, compute the sum of its divisors, and print the result using a for loop.
Consider the detailed steps you need: read input, set sum to 0, iterate candidate divisors, test each candidate, add when it divides, then print the sum.
Refine the loop step into sub-comments: for each i from 1 to n, check if i divides n; if yes, add i to sum; also note where to read input and where to print the final sum.
